title: Secluded Caribbean Island Hideout with Daily Breakfast, US$50 Daily Dining & One-Time US$100 Spa Credit
description:
Idyllic coastal seclusion awaits ashore the second largest of the Grenadine islands, Bequia: the stunning island home of The Liming Bequia - a tranquil destination perfect for those seeking wellness, relaxation and romance. Be the first of many to discover this newly opened secret oceanside hideout perfect for honeymooners looking to feel a million miles from the rest of the world. Delve deep into the beauty of the Caribbean with a stay at this charming resort, set close enough to the beach, the whoosh of the waves will be your soothing daily soundtrack.

Boasting an intimate number of self-contained modern suites and striking villas with private infinity pools, this slice of paradise offers friendly and memorable service, impeccable dining and tailored in-room spa treatments - all along a virtually private stretch of beach. Uncover the essence of relaxation with this decadent Caribbean escape.
offer_address: Beach Street, Bequia VC0400, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
